Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType

Language: en

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode where concept descends from _ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType

name: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
title: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
description: A role of a place that further classifies the setting (e.g., accident site, road side, work site, community location) in which services are delivered.
